description: Slim through the hip with a slight taper at the hem, the No Sweat Pant is crafted in their bestselling stretch fabric that’s designed to feel like your sweats with 5-pocket detailing for a polished, versatile look. Plant-rich fibres offer moisture management and antibacterial properties for less washing and comfort across seasons.
name: Duer No Sweat Pants Slim, 30" Inseam - Mens
